text.div:
Generated Narrative: CodeSystem cs-sign-level-of-evidence

This case-insensitive code system http://fhir.awmf.org/awmf.ig/CodeSystem/cs-sign-level-of-evidence defines the following codes:

CodeDisplayDefinitionDeutsch (German, de)
1plusplus 1++High-quality meta-analyses, systematic reviews of RCTs, or RCTs with a very low risk of bias.1++
1plus 1+Well-conducted meta-analyses, systematic reviews, or RCTs with a low risk of bias.1+
1minus 1-Meta-analyses, systematic reviews, or RCTs with a high risk of bias.1-
2plusplus 2++High-quality systematic reviews of case-control or cohort studies, or high-quality case-control or cohort studies with a very low risk of confounding or bias and a high probability that the relationship is causal.2++
2plus 2+Well-conducted case-control or cohort studies with a low risk of confounding or bias and a moderate probability that the relationship is causal.2+
2minus 2-Case-control or cohort studies with a high risk of confounding or bias and a significant risk that the relationship is not causal.2-
3 3Non-analytic studies, e.g., case reports, case series.3
4 4Expert opinion.4

name: SIGNLevelOfEvidence
title: SIGN Level of Evidence
description: CodeSystem representing the Scottish Intercollegiate Guidelines Network (SIGN) Levels of Evidence.

concept.definition: High-quality meta-analyses, systematic reviews of RCTs, or RCTs with a very low risk of bias.

extension.valueString: Hochwertige Metaanalysen, systematische Reviews von RCTs oder RCTs mit sehr niedrigem Bias-Risiko.

concept.definition: Well-conducted meta-analyses, systematic reviews, or RCTs with a low risk of bias.

extension.valueString: Gut durchgeführte Metaanalysen, systematische Reviews oder RCTs mit geringem Bias-Risiko.

concept.definition: Meta-analyses, systematic reviews, or RCTs with a high risk of bias.

extension.valueString: Metaanalysen, systematische Reviews oder RCTs mit hohem Bias-Risiko.

concept.definition: High-quality systematic reviews of case-control or cohort studies, or high-quality case-control or cohort studies with a very low risk of confounding or bias and a high probability that the relationship is causal.

extension.valueString: Hochwertige systematische Reviews von Fall-Kontroll- oder Kohortenstudien oder hochwertige Fall-Kontroll- oder Kohortenstudien mit sehr niedrigem Risiko für Confounding oder Bias.

concept.definition: Well-conducted case-control or cohort studies with a low risk of confounding or bias and a moderate probability that the relationship is causal.

extension.valueString: Gut durchgeführte Fall-Kontroll- oder Kohortenstudien (nicht-randomisierte Studien) mit niedrigem Risiko für Confounding oder Bias.

concept.definition: Case-control or cohort studies with a high risk of confounding or bias and a significant risk that the relationship is not causal.

extension.valueString: Fall-Kontroll- oder Kohortenstudien mit hohem Risiko für Confounding oder Bias.

concept.definition: Non-analytic studies, e.g., case reports, case series.

extension.valueString: Nicht-analytische Studien, z. B. Fallberichte, Fallserien.
